room_title: Escape room "Save Sir Carter! " by Great Scott Mystery Rooms in Hartford
room_description:
In The Detective's Dinner Party game, we met Sir Carter Whittington, an eccentric millionaire who met his untimely death at the hands of Jack the Ripper. 
In the latest chapter of Sir Carter's dramatic adventures, we find that Jack has broken Sir Carter's time machine, but Sir Carter has left behind cryptic messages that might just contain instructions to repair the damaged machine. 
 If that's possible, then perhaps you can rewind time and send a message to Sir Carter BEFORE he meets Jack and prevent his murder!
